summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help the federal government save money, address issues on our High Risk List, and significantly improve government operations. This letter to the Department of Labor outlines 13 open recommendations that it should prioritize. The recommendations relate to stronger protections for wage earners, enhancing unemployment insurance; and protecting sensitive information. For example, DOL faces challenges protecting the...
title: Priority Open Recommendations: Department of Labor
